name: Draw Puzzle 画之谜
description: Draw puzzle is a casual puzzle game that is relaxing and challenging. Solving the puzzle by connecting squares with the same color and number to unlock pixel art.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7/8/10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up Storage: 200 MB available space
